NHAICOMMERCIAL OPERATIONS/107 Sub:- Advance planning for levy and collection of USER FEE in the light of the provisions of New Fee Rules, 2008. National Highways Fee (Determination of Rates and Collection) Rules, 2008 (New Fee Rules, 2008) has since been published. As per this New Fee Rule, 2008, i) a fee plaza shall be established beyond a distance of 10 Kms from a Municipal or Local town area limits; ii) Distance between two fee plazas shall be 60 Kms It is observed that in number of sections distance between two fee plazas are less than the prescribed limit of 60 Kms or are proposed within a distance of 10 Kms from the Municipal limits of 10 Kms. In the light of the published rule it is necessary to re-examine the locations of fee plazas are not in conformity with the New Fee Rules, 2008. All the Project Directors are directed to re examine the location of fee plazas with their adjoining Project Directors and submit the alternative location of fee plazas (if are not in conformity with the new fee rules, 2008) to the respect RO o1 concerned technical division at HO If RO is not functional as yet) Respective RO/ concerned technical division after examination will submit the proposal to HO for final approval.
